derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French, or from Latin pubescent- 'reaching puberty', from the verb pubescere

entry.tran: 到达青春期的；到达发育期的
entry.def: A pubescent girl or boy has reached the stage in their life when their body is becoming physically like an adult's.

example.ex: ...a horde of pubescent boys and girls who tug at his microphone.

means.word_mean: 1. (of animals especially human beings) having arrived at the onset of puberty (the age at which sex glands become functional) but not yet fully mature;

sentences.sentence: "the budding breasts of a pubescent girl and the downy chin of pubescent boy"

means.word_mean: 2. covered with fine soft hairs or down;
